FuncDef: The display ospf topology verbose command displays the SPF tree information depending on process and area for OSPFv2. The display ospf topology verbose command displays the SPF tree information depending on process and area for OSPFv2.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the ID of an OSPF area.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the ID of an OSPF area in IP address format.
The value is in the format of an IPv4 address.

ExtraInfo: The display ospf topology command displays topology information about route calculation in an OSPF process, including the time when route calculation occurs, causes, and number of changed routes. To check the cause of OSPF route flapping, you can run this command to obtain information about OSPF route calculation and diagnose OSPF route flapping based on the information.
